title: A Great Life Starts with Gratitude: The Practice of Appreciation that will Transform Your Life: A Gratitude Journal
description: A Great Life Starts With Gratitude Journal is a powerful way for anyone to manifest all of the love, happiness, health, and wealth they can imagine.In this journal you will write down what you are grateful for every day. There are also inspiring quotes to reflect on from some of the most successful people in the world, past and present.This simple daily practice is pure magic by raising your vibration and attracting to you all that you desire.This Journal Will:* Help you start your day in high vibe mode* Keep you in a positive state* Inspire happiness*Get you focused on more of what you want to create in your lifeStart each day writing down things you are thankful for. Whether it's something simple or grand....appreciate EVERYTHING.Manifest a life you love through the simple, daily practice of gratitude.Laura and SusanXO
author: Laura Gawne
